pullrequest.title: Added Brian's fix for keeping update window open

content.raw:
font size increase:
~~~
diff -r 170c2b1dbefe shortcuts/haptixUpdate
--- a/shortcuts/haptixUpdate	Wed Mar 04 14:16:01 2015 -0800
+++ b/shortcuts/haptixUpdate	Wed Mar 04 14:46:20 2015 -0800
@@ -1,4 +1,5 @@
 #!/bin/sh
 
 # Check for updates in the HAPTIX software.
-xterm -hold -T 'haptixUpdate' -e 'sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install handsim; echo "Update complete; close this window to finish."'
+xterm -fa 'Monospace' -fs 14 -hold -T 'haptixUpdate' \
+  -e 'sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install handsim; echo "Update complete; close this window to finish."'
~~~
